x_nuvo_diag_probes.description: SVG missig from sys_properties: glide.attachment.extensions. Causes faults in the graphic sync
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: SVG Allowance - Graphic Sync
x_nuvo_diag_probes.remediation: Add SVG type to property list

sys_update_version.name: x_nuvo_diag_probes_702efbaf1bb4d510ae5b21b5ec4bcbcb
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probes"><x_nuvo_diag_probes action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>SVG missig from sys_properties: glide.attachment.extensions. Causes faults in the graphic sync</description><healthcheck_type/><name>SVG Allowance - Graphic Sync</name><order>100</order><probe_type/><product_version/><remediation>Add SVG type to property list</remediation><script><![CDATA[var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();

var prop = util.getSystemProperties('glide.attachment.extensions');
//var value = prop.value; 

if (!prop.includes('svg')) {
	util.handleOutput('System Property glide.attachment.extensions is missing the svg type. This could cause issues when performing the graphic sync in the autoCAD plug-in.', 'Warning','Cad Extension');
}]]></script><sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Michael.Piazza@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-26 14:11:41</sys_created_on><sys_id>702efbaf1bb4d510ae5b21b5ec4bcbcb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SVG Allowance - Graphic Sync</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes_702efbaf1bb4d510ae5b21b5ec4bcbcb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Stefan.Popov@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-17 11:21:27</sys_updated_on><tool>diagnostic</tool></x_nuvo_diag_probes></record_update>
